rooms.description: A welcoming open space with a Bohemian flair featuring decorative tiles, ambient lighting, and a small fountain. Vastu guidelines ensure proper energy flow.
A compact but comfortable room for the domestic help, including a small kitchenette and attached bathroom. The design is kept minimal yet functional.
A spacious Bohemian living area with a mix of vibrant colors and textures. Features include an open plan layout, built-in seating, and artistic decor.
A dining space that flows seamlessly with the living room. Traditional Bohemian accents combined with modern elements provide a warm ambience.
A large master bedroom that includes an attached dressing room and en-suite bathroom. The design follows Vastu principles ensuring proper alignment.
A comfortable bedroom designed for guests or additional family members. Bohemian style with accent walls and unique decor.
A versatile bedroom space, suitable for children or shared use. Incorporates playful Bohemian elements and ample storage.
A dedicated study area that doubles as an office. Minimalistic design with modern Bohemian touches and adequate lighting.

openings.description: Large, inviting door with traditional motifs. Aligns with Vastu principles to welcome positive energy.
Allows access from the living room to the dining area. Provides natural light and an open feel.
Separate entrance for servant's quarters ensuring privacy and convenience. Vastu compliant with proper directional placement.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom for guests or extended family. Bohemian decor with a mix of vintage and modern elements.
A scenic outdoor space offering views of the swimming pool. Designed for relaxation with ample seating and decorative elements.

openings.description: A wide, spiral staircase connecting the ground floor to the upper floor, with safety railings and Vastu-compliant placement.
A service lift for easy movement of goods and appliances. Designed to be discreet yet functional.
